Text.content:
For example, the JSON of the first blog article can be accessed with the a_00001.xml file.

{
  "Author": "Jay Pritchett",

          "path": "/sites/default/.galleries/office/02.jpg"
        }
      },
      "Text": "<p>At vero eos et accusamus et ...</p>"
    }
  ],
  "Title": "OpenCms is intuitive"
}
